subject: [Wordfence Alert] Problems found on wolper.com.au
preview: This email was sent from your website "Wolper Jewish Hospital" by the Wordfence plugin. Wordfence found the following new issues on "Wolper Jewish Hospital" (6 existing issues were also found again).

full_threads.body:
